price: When the magicians came, they said to Pharaoh, “Will there be a reward for us if we are victorious?”
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالُواْ لِفِرۡعَوۡنَ أَئِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجۡرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحۡنُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
